description: After finishing of this course, you will be Able to Monitor your Network, Servers and all IT Infrastructure using the best and also free monitoring tool: Nagios. You will also learn how to fast and easy install the Ubuntu Linux Server and the Open Monitoring Distribution (OMD). I will start with teaching you from scratch (a bare metal machine) with all the necessary steps and software to get everything working. From that point it's only about you to keep an eye on the performance graphs or SLA (Service Level Agreement) Reports and find ways to improve your network in every areas: speed, cost, budget, and so on.
title: Complete IT Monitoring: Installing Nagios on Linux Server
